Description.Details: Kinetic Kill missiles use huge rocket motors to accelerate a heavy metal dart to high velocity. They penetrate armor well, but require time to reach full velocity. Damage increases at longer range. Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit. Left Click on Ammo count during battle to swap Ammo Type. Ctrl+click on ammunition counter to eject ammo.
Description.Name: Thunderbolt 15 Ammo
